resources.string:
"Chemo Buddy

"
"This is a mini project completed as a part of Mobile Application Development Laboratory " "by Students of CSE Tejas.R(1RN20CS167) and V.Tanmay(1RN20CS171).

"
"Our Chemo buddy app provides a specific and customized health care service." "Many people have disorders like Heamophilia, which does'nt really find use in a generic" "healthcare application. This application seeks to find solutions for this purpose.

"
"This app provides features such as monitoring patients by the doctors, calculation of " "dosage of medicines, availibility of medicine in nearby hospitals..etc.

"
